committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Insurance

official_title: To require the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to conduct annual on-site examinations of all primary dealers in government debt instruments, to prohibit federally insured depository institutions from engaging in certain transactions with registered government securities dealers which do not meet capital requirements established for registered brokers and dealers, and for other purposes.
short_title: Primary Dealers Examination and Improvement Act

summary.text: Primary Dealers Examination and Improvement Act - Requires the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to perform annual on-site examinations of primary dealers in government debt instruments. Requires the Federal National Mortgage Association and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation to establish procedures to prevent securities market distortions. Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to subject primary dealers to administrative enforcement authority.

titles.title: Primary Dealers Examination and Improvement Act

To require the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to conduct annual on-site examinations of all primary dealers in government debt instruments, to prohibit federally insured depository institutions from engaging in certain transactions with registered government securities dealers which do not meet capital requirements established for registered brokers and dealers, and for other purposes.
